item.title: Adding Edgeville Wild to ZDR
item.dc:creator: @Gam3code Gam3code
item.description:
@Gam3code wrote:

Hey guys. I need help. I added this but still edgeville wild is not an attack zone. Help Please (im using ZDR base)

This is the code im usingâ€¦

public boolean inwildy = true;
public boolean inwildy2 = true;
public void checkwildy()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672))
{
inwildy = true;
}
else
{
inwildy = true;
}
}
public void checkwildy2()
{
if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514))
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
else
{
inwildy2 = true;
}
}

Let me know what I did wrong.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 08:40:30 PM[/size][hr]Im pretty sure they are the right cords but is that the problem?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 07, 2008, 08:45:03 PM[/size][hr]anyone know :(?/
